title: Interview: What’s next for CeramicSpeed’s Driven driveshaft bicycle group?
content:
Just recently, CeramicSpeed’s Driven drivetrain concept announced it was raising money through SeedInvest, offering ownership of the company for private investors. Just days later, Driven CEO Jason Smith emailed us to say they hit their funding target of $1 million USD. So, we wondered…what does that mean for the company? When can we expect it […]

The post Interview: What’s next for CeramicSpeed’s Driven driveshaft bicycle group? appeared first on Bikerumor.
author: Tyler Benedict
